empty.booksSubtitle: Try adjusting your filters or add your first book
empty.seriesSubtitle: Try adjusting your filters or add your first series

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Enter your email and password to access your library

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Enter your details to get started with 10x Bookkeeper
signup.passwordPlaceholder: 8+ chars with upper, lower, number, symbol
signup.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and include upper, lower, number, and symbol
signup.successSubtitle: Confirm your email to finish creating your account, then sign in.

forgot.title: Reset your password
forgot.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgot.successSubtitle: If an account exists for that email, we've sent a password reset link.
forgot.nextStep1: Check your inbox for an email from 10x Bookkeeper
forgot.nextStep2: Click the password reset link in the email

reset.expiredSubtitle: Your reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
reset.title: Set new password
reset.subtitle: Enter a new password for your account
reset.newPasswordPlaceholder: 8+ chars with upper, lower, number, symbol
reset.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and include upper, lower, number, and symbol
reset.linkExpired: Your reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must include at least one number
validation.passwordSymbol: Password must include at least one symbol

errors.rateLimitedDescription: You're doing that too often. Please wait and try again.
errors.internalDescription: We encountered an error. Please try again.
errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.title: Error

book.notFoundSubtitle: It may have been deleted or the link is incorrect.

notes.addDisabledReason: Add chapters first to organize your notes
notes.emptySubtitle: Start adding notes to capture insights from your reading
notes.emptyNoChapters: Add chapters first to organize your notes by book sections

chapters.emptySubtitle: Start organizing your book by adding chapters

series.notFoundSubtitle: This series may have been deleted or the link might be incorrect. Please check the URL and try again.

books.emptyTitle: No books found in this series
books.emptySubtitle: Add books to this series from the Library page using the series filter

chapter.addDescription: Create a new chapter to organize your notes for this book.
chapter.editDescription: Update the chapter title or change its position in the book.
chapter.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {title}?
chapter.deleteWarningBody: This will permanently delete all notes and embeddings associated with this chapter. This action cannot be undone.

book.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {title}?
book.deleteWarningBody: This will permanently delete all chapters and notes associated with this book. This action cannot be undone.

note.addDescription: Create a new note for this book chapter.
note.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this note from {title}?
note.deleteWarningBody: This will permanently delete this note. This action cannot be undone.

series.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {title}?
series.cascadeLabel: Also delete all books, chapters, and notes in this series
series.cascadeWarningBody: This will permanently delete all content in this series. This action cannot be undone.

account.deleteDescription: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
account.deleteWarningBody: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your series, books, chapters, notes, and search history. This cannot be undone.
account.deleteEmailMismatch: Email does not match. Please type your exact email address to confirm.
account.deleteError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

apiErrors.conflictEmail: An account with this email already exists.
apiErrors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please try again later.
apiErrors.resetLinkActive: A reset link is already active. Use the latest email or wait a bit and try again.
apiErrors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
apiErrors.internal: An internal error occurred. Please try again.
apiErrors.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before signing in.
apiErrors.passwordSame: New password must be different from your current password.
apiErrors.passwordExpired: Recovery session expired. Please request a new reset link.

chat.seriesHint: This book isn't in a series yet. Link it to a series to enable series-wide questions.
chat.emptyBook: Ask a question about this book to get started
chat.emptySeries: Ask a question about this series to get started
chat.placeholderBook: Ask a question about this book...
chat.placeholderSeries: Ask a question about this series...
chat.lowConfidenceBase1: Add notes to the relevant chapter(s)
chat.lowConfidenceBase2: Try a more specific phrasing (names, places, chapter number)
chat.lowConfidenceBookSeries: Try switching to 'This series' for broader context
chat.lowConfidenceSeries: Try narrowing to a specific book, or add more notes
chat.lowConfidenceBook: Confirm you're asking about the right book

dialog.clearDescription: This will clear the current chat transcript. This cannot be undone.

prompts.noNotes: No notes available for this query scope.
